Title: Relates to background clearances for prospective employees and volunteers of mentoring programs
Summary: Permits mentoring programs to conduct background clearances of prospective employees and volunteers to determine whether any such person has been reported for child abuse or maltreatment or is on the sex offender registry.
LawCode: Amd ยง390-e, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to background clearances for employees and volunteers of mentoring programs
